pullrequest.title: First version of Displays widget with sample DisplayPlugins

content.raw:
Works for me, thanks for addressing all the comments!

I really like the grid display, I think it's more useful than `Grid3D`. If the displays widget ever supports adding and removing displays, I think we can even get rid of `Grid3D`.

It doesn't make much sense to me to have the real time factor displayed in the 3D world like that though, but I imagine you must have your reasons. It would be really cool to make that configurable some day, so users can display 3D text from any arbitrary message. :angel: I would even argue that the plugin is so specific right now, that there's really not much use in it being shipped with ign-gui, perhaps you could consider either making it more general, or moving it to a downstream project.

Approving!
